casebody.data:
No. 1044,

Misc.

Lion Manufacturing Corp. et al. v. McGuire, Chief Judge, U. S. District Court. Paul R. Connolly, E. Barrett *921Prettyman, Jr. and- Martin M: Nelson for petitioners. Solicitor G.eneral Cox, Acting Assistant Attorney General Douglas and Morton Hollander for respondent.

*920Motion for leave to file petition for writ of mandamus denied.

Mr. Justice White took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.
